html:
the King of Israel., Note this title (1) in connection with the O.T. manifestation of the kingdom; (2) the Gospels, the proclamation of the kingdom by the Son (Matthew 27:42. Mark 15:32. John 1:49; John 12:13). All were rejected, and the kingdom therefore is now in abeyance.

his Redeemer:, i.e. his Kinsman-Redeemer. Reference to Pentateuch (See note on Isaiah 41:14).

the first, &c., See note on Isaiah 41:4. Quoted in Revelation 1:17.

beside Me., Reference to Pentateuch (Deuteronomy 4:35. Deuteronomy 32:39). the first, &c. See note on Isaiah 41:4. Quoted in Revelation 1:17, &c.

beside Me., Reference to Pentateuch (Deuteronomy 4:35; Deuteronomy 32:39). App-92.

God., Hebrew. Elohim., App-4.
